turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Google

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to know the Menu for Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The menu at starbucks is : Cappuccino Caramel Brulée Latte Seasonal offering Caramel Macchiato Cherry Mocha Chestnut Praline Latte Seasonal offering Cinnamon Dolce Latte Cinnamon Shortbread Latte Cordusio Eggnog Latte Seasonal offering Espresso Espresso Con Panna Espresso Macchiato Espresso Macchiato Flat White Gingerbread Latte Seasonal offering Iced Black and White Mocha Seasonal offering Iced Caffè Americano Iced Caffè Latte Iced Caffè Mocha Iced Caramel Brulée Latte Iced Caramel Macchiato Iced Cherry Mocha Iced Chestnut Praline Latte Seasonal offering Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte Iced Cinnamon Shortbread Latte Iced Cold Foam Cappuccino Iced Cordusio Iced Eggnog Latte Seasonal offering Iced Gingerbread Latte Seasonal offering Iced Juniper Latte Iced Latte Macchiato Iced Peppermint Mocha Seasonal offering Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha Seasonal offering Iced Pumpkin Spice Chai Latte Iced Pumpkin Spice Latte Iced Salted Caramel Mocha Iced Skinny Cinnamon Dolce Latte Iced Skinny Mocha Iced Starbucks Blonde® Juniper Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Black and White Mocha Seasonal offering Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caffè Americano Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caffè Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caramel Brulée Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Chestnut Praline Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Cinnamon Shortbread Latte Iced Starbucks® Blonde Cold Foam Cappuccino

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thats a lot of options, I want a Cappachino Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, you would like me to order it from Starbucks yes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct. from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and you asked for a Venti right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you know a Venti is Itallian for a 20 ounce drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Assistant, I did. Did you get that drink order down?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I did!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, whats the next step?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I need to know a store to order this from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I am in the Greater Salt Lake Area

turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, thats a lot of options.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It sure is! Which one would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the one one Redwood Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 6950 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT , is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes Assistant, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great, would you like me to place this order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to pick this up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In an hour

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, order placed for a Venti Cappachino at 6950 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT in one hour. Thank you!
